website_summaries.verdict: The Wave Inspire 12 from Mizuno is a daily running companion that is efficient and trustworthy. The shoe garnered quite the popularity from runners who search for a running shoe that offers responsible stability and control. Though a few have some issues with the shoe, it is still considered by some success a successful update to the Wave Inspire line.
pros: The AIRmesh is the fabric of the Inspire 12 and it offers breathable and comfortable coverage
Most reviewers appreciated the Stitched Overlays that are located in the lateral and medial sides, giving a snug yet secure fit
The Ortholite Sock Liner gives additional cushioning, moisture wicking and anti-microbial protection
The U4ic is a mid-sole material that is shock absorption, durability, and responsiveness
Moderate over-pronation of the foot is handled by the added mid-sole components, such as the Wave tech and the Smooth Ride system
X10 is an outsole unit that is super durable and efficient when dealing with wear and abrasion
The Wave Inspire 12 has systems that improve the natural flexibility of the foot
cons: Some runners noticed that it was a bit narrow in the forefoot area, making the toes clump uncomfortably close together
There were testers who noted that it didn’t offer as much stability as the previous version
This running shoe has a slightly expensive price

customer_reviews.title: Great vfm supportive running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've never had Mizuno trainers before, I bought a half size up on my normal shoe size & they're a great fit. I have flat feet so needed a supportive shoe & these are v comfortable, I run every day and have not had any injuries in them, no shin splints to which I have been prone in the past (& which I still get from other shoes). They're quite a fluorescent pink which is great for outdoors. They were a great price & excellent value, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bizzie

customer_reviews.title: Cushioned soles feel very comfortable. I like the purple color
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear uk5, and ordered uk5. A wee bit tight fit but Doesn't bother me when I run. I think because it's soft textile so it can stretch a bit to fit the feet. Cushioned soles feel very comfortable. I like the purple color, look great. It's a good buy considering it's almost half price off.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: These are great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are my favourite!! I've had the running shoes before. They fit me well and they are great for all sports and gym work. Good value too.
customer_reviews.author: christine siddall

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for overpronation
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, great colour. I bought them as they state they are good for helping with overpronation and they do, my feet feel more stable and my ankles are not collapsing under me. Removed most of my foot pain
customer_reviews.author: Ms. P. J. Lake

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I found them very comfortable to run in. They're nice and bright so people can see you coming! They are supportive where they need to be - I was having a few issues with painful feet in my old trainers and these have helped a lot with that. I'm glad I purchased them and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Mizuno for years so knew my size. If you've not worn Mizuno before, I suggest you try them on first as their sizes are small. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Linda Meehan Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Good Stability Trainer - would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable trainers and really supportive. I over-pronate in both feet and they offer excellent support. I would definitely recommend these trainers to those that are looking for stability in the foot.
customer_reviews.author: loulla77

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Colour, fit and price excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these for a number of years and have been paying double the price from local suppliers. I am therefore delighted with this purchase and are as expected. Lovely colour and excellent fit.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Millington

customer_reviews.title: they are great if you have a general running pronation
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these make of shoe for the past 5 years, they are great if you have a general running pronation. I am very tall and have a size 8 foot, so the size 9 fits well
customer_reviews.author: Rowena

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent running shoes. Love them so much I bought three pairs and the men's equivalent for my husband. Size as described.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable running shoe at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Having found a pair of Mizuno Wave Inspire 11 running shoes very comfortable as an overpronator, I felt confident these would be just as good, and I am not disappointed. Lovely colour too!
customer_reviews.author: ladyham

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and fit well but not the pink displayed in the picture - these are much more neon pink/orange
customer_reviews.author: FionaHelen77

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and great value for money from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: I. Rennie

customer_reviews.title: Even from first run/gym session in them they are incredibly comfortable and well fitted
customer_reviews.text: Last pair of trainers were Mizunos and I was impressed with them so I wanted to stick with the brand. Even from first run/gym session in them they are incredibly comfortable and well fitted, offering me the support I need.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Finch

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love these tuning shoes. From moment I put them on they are perfect, really good ankle support. They are my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: sadie grimes

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, I have the wave 11 so got the 12 as it looked very similar and I was happy with 11, they've just worn out. 12 are just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favourite running shoe and didn't disappoint thank you Mizuno!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable - best fit I have found in recent years having tried few dfferent makes
customer_reviews.author: anam chara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the very few trainers that are comfortable from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the bright colours though
customer_reviews.text: Was running on the wave 9. Wave 12 is much lighter but not as "cushiony" as I hoped. Love the bright colours though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these trainers. Great for running. These are my second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: ... of the Mizuno Wave Inspire 11's and these are pretty much the
customer_reviews.text: I have had two pairs of the Mizuno Wave Inspire 11's and these are pretty much the same
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: great shoes at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Had bought a pair of these already and wanted a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Narrower across the toe than my old Wave Inspire 7s, but this was to be expected from other comments/reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... order the different versions of this shoe and always satisfied and happy with siZe and fit
customer_reviews.text: I always order the different versions of this shoe and always satisfied and happy with siZe and fit
customer_reviews.author: Olympia Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great support shoes and as I was expected really good for long run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoe for runners
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant shoe for overpronaters.I used to run in mizuno nirvana but they stopped making it. Then tried mizuno paradox but it was awful. This shoe is brilliant. Injury free and racking up the mileage very comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: They are a little heavier than my usual running purchases but very sturdy. I went for a jog and then a ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes require 3-5 days of breaking in by walking around just to get use to the heel and weight of the shoes. They are a little heavier than my usual running purchases but very sturdy. I went for a jog and then a run and found the glide very stable and simple. They can feel a little less smooth and streamline but the impact and cushion is very well designed. I have an ankle injury and would definitely recommend it for distance runners. The price was acceptable and the soles of the shoes are designed to last for mileage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and springy trainers
customer_reviews.text: Very springy running shoes. I was wearing Asics GT2000s before and fancied a change. So far so good with these. No rubbing, no blisters and no aches and pains. I can see me doing many miles in them. They do fit similar to Asics. I've bought a whole size larger than my shoe size to allow for hot swelling feet in padded socks. The ankle of the shoe is padded with memory foam and is very soft but really moulds to the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K. O'Haire

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought these trainers for my sister who is a runners d can say that she’s very happy
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: These are the most comfortable pair of trainers I have tried in a long ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable pair of trainers I have tried in a long time. Very supportive in all areas, but I especially noticed the support around the ankle. The lacing is well placed to adjust for wider feet or swelling without losing support. The sole is durable and I have not noticed any stones or dips on the ground when wearing the trainers. With all the support and the thick sole you would expect these trainers to be heavy but to my surprise they are very lightweight. The stitching and overall construction are excellent and even with some intentional pulling around the seams there is no give or damage.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Great looks combined with top class cushioning!
customer_reviews.text: A lovely pair of women's ruinning shoes from one of the top names in running shoes. These shoes are very well cushioned in the sole and heal and ideal for over-pronators giving balance and stability. The image shows the correct colours - but in real life they seem even brighter and will certainly stand out from the crowd. Well constructed, comfortable, well cushioned these running shoes would be ideal for jogging or long distance running.
customer_reviews.author: Nozza

customer_reviews.title: Quality running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Well made quality running shoe. They have a very snug fit. Initially it was difficult to get them on. Once the laces were loosened a little the feet slide in and are comfortably snug. Sole is very strong and solid. Uppers are very flexible and breathable. Very comfortable in use as the uppers flex and stretch with your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mini-Me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Mrs P wears these and has declared them great. They are a bit garish, so I wouldn't try wearing them for fashion purposes, but they are lightweight and flexible. Well made that your feet don't feel uncomfortable after getting sweaty feet too. Great for intended purpose. A+
customer_reviews.author: R. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Comes in new simple package and box inside is plain with trainer logo. Trainers are glorious colour and vivid. Very stylish with thick soles and curves underneath that look supportive to curve of your feet. .It looks and feels well made and robust. Great thickness for cushioning and will hopefully last well.
customer_reviews.author: Thinker

product_meta.title: Mizuno Women's Wave Inspire 12 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Lightweight comfort, better performance. Double fan wave and wider gauge for moderate stability. U4icx midsole for lightweight runs. U4icx stroble lasting board for high comfortable and cushioned footbed.
feature_bullets: AIRMESH - Offers exceptional breathability to keep your feet cool, dry and comfortable.
DynaMotion Fit - Moulds to the shape of your foot and works engages with your foot throughout the gait cycle to provide extra support.
Mizuno Intercool - Keeps your feet cool whilst you run by providing extra ventilation.
Pebax RNEW - Wave Plate constructed from pebax Rnew, a sustainable compound made from plant based oil and low carbon production, while retaining high performance characteristics
Premium Insock - A high-grade removable insock for comfort and cushioning.
